page.title: 10DRIVER
page.content: My dad works an a farm. He drives a big lorry used for carrying sheep, pigs or cattle. He works for Sternberg's Farms. Mr Sternberg or Lord Plurenden was a big land owner in the Tenterden area . My dad drives his lorry from place to place collecting or moving the cattle or pigs. Often my dad comes home very late so I don't see him as much as I would like. The manqger of the farm is Tom Forsythe. Now that Lord Plurenden has died, his wife owns the farm but she has managers to take charge of each part of it. During the spring and summer my dad is extra busy.When it is time for the county show, the farm sends lots of cattle. This year the Sternberg cattle won first prize for the Sannoa's.
